document.full_text: teva pharmaceutical industries ltd   struck a deal to acquire u.s. specialty drugmaker cephalon inc  for nearly $7 billion, topping an unsolicited bid by canada's valeant pharmaceuticals international inc.
document.title: teva to buy cephalon for $6.8 billion, tops valeant
lines_and_colors: teva pharmaceutical industries ltd   struck a deal to acquire u.s. specialty drugmaker cephalon inc  for nearly $7 billion, topping an unsolicited bid by canada's valeant pharmaceuticals international inc.
